revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=MI424WR |revision=D |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |est_release_date=08/20/2007 |fcc_date=08/24/2006 |fcc_id=LNQ802MAG |type=wireless router, FiOS modem |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP420;PRIXP420ABD; |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F640J3D-75 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620FTP-H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J20 |wi1_module=Actiontec 802MAG |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Micrel |sw_model=KSZ8995MA |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags=MoCA 1.0 |stock_boot=RGLoader |stock_os=Linux;2.4.21;Jungo OpenRG; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, LEDE Project, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''unit's serial number'' |oui=00:1F:90,00:18:01 |oui_eth=00:1F:90,00:18:01 }} :[http://opensource.actiontec.com/mi424wracd.html GPL Code download center]
The CPU is part [[Intel XScale]] IXP420 (PRIXP420ABD @533MHz). :There are no heatsinks installed on this unit.
The device uses two ''Entropic Comm.'' EN2210 for the coaxial ([http://www.mocalliance.org/ MoCA]) connections. :[http://www.mocalliance.org/industry/certificates/MIC018%20-%20Actiontec.pdf MoCA 1.0 certification, 08/20/2007] (presumed to be close [or closer than :the FCC approval date for the wireless module, anyway] to the release date)
The default SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers (example: '''34M42'''). *{{TechInfoDepot|Actiontec_MI424WR_rev_D}}
===Links=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/mi424wr ''Actiontec MI424WR'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/MI424WR ''Actiontec MI424WR'' on the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=145115 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (internal shots) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=23514 ''Actiontec MI424WR'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.avsforum.com/avs-vb/showthread.php?t=1145636 ''Actiontec MI424WR'' on the '''AVS''' forums]
===PSU=== The power adapter included with the device is a '''[[Actiontec]]''' :ADS6818-1505-WDB 0530 (5VDC, 3A, 15W)
